name: doratheexplorerandfriendsgoingonaberryhunt
description: Help Dora, Boots & her friends get to Blueberry Hill. Adventure ensues when Swiper tries to swipe your berries, when you run out of supplies. This game is done in the fashion of classic [Oregon Trail](http://fourthgradegingerich.weebly.com/oregon-trail-game.html "Oregon Trail Game").
